items.question: Can you integrate with my current CRM and tools?
items.answer: Absolutely. Works best if your tools play nice with Zapier, Make, or have an API — but we can handle the weird ones too.

items.question: Do I need technical expertise to work with you?
items.answer: Zero. You focus on selling — I’ll handle the nerdy stuff behind the curtain.

items.question: How quickly can I expect results?
items.answer: Most teams see more replies, better lead quality, and fewer headaches within the first month.

items.question: What if I'm not even sure what I need?
items.answer: No problem — bring your chaos to the free strategy call and I’ll bring the clarity.

items.question: Will this mess with my current sales ops?
items.answer: Not a chance. My job is to improve what’s working — not bulldoze it.

items.question: Is this just another AI tool?
items.answer: Nope. This isn’t some off-the-shelf tool — it’s hands-on consulting plus custom-built automation tailored to your process, tools, and goals.

about.title: Meet Vitor, Founder of Verdit
content: I've spent 20 years building software — trading platforms, smart contracts, AI systems, you name it.
Big corporations, scrappy startups, logistics chains — I've worked with them all. And here’s what I learned: the fanciest tool doesn’t win. The system that *actually fits* your workflow does.
At Verdit, I help lean sales teams punch above their weight with AI and automation that plugs into their process — not forces a new one.
No more missed follow-ups. No more wasted hours. Just clean, automated flows that do the grunt work while you focus on deals.
If you're juggling spreadsheets and living in your inbox, let's fix that — and help you scale without hiring an army.
